Text: I tried to wait until Zygor stopped patching and releasing updates to death before I uploaded one so we wouldn't have to keep manually updating.

i made an account so i can thank you for uploading on patch day.
i noticed that zygor team tend to make fix sometime 1 day after another thus releasing a newer version it's a real pain to have to uploaded it everytime but i am very gratefull that you do.
You're very welcome. Get out there and save Azeroth :P
I made an account to agree with almasyseifer :))
thanks so much for getting this up so promptly!
Thanks bro, always the best, can't wait for the Isle of Thunder quests
Thanks man. So you have a friend who owns a copy of zygor and when they come out with patches he gives u them? sweet!!

thanks for uploading the guide, i have a problem here you may help me, everytime i copy and paste the folder to addons folder when i log the game i cant find it on my addons.
note: i am using mac and i tried log in and out many time. thanks

@husn

I don't know what to tell you other than to go to your character select screen and hit the addons button, then check "load out of date addons".
Thank you and love you Raikalo. You're stuff is amazing as always!
i kept deleting and copy paste again and again till i found it with my addons ingame thanks.
Great job from you and zygor team! Thanks!
Thank you! There's a new version just uploaded today, 4.0.6034.
